Sentencas: In this study, a dynamic analysis model for integrated gasification fuel cell (IGFC) power generation was developed and the dynamic characteristics of electric power output by the system were investigated.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle

Sentencas: Using the proposed analytical model, the study addressed the frequency deviation of electric power output, the inertia system of gas and steam turbines, the air fuel ratio of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), and load patterns.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle

Sentencas: Moreover, using the model, an example of an electric power load pattern in Japan was examined.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle

Sentencas: Because the supply and demand difference in electric power can be monitored as frequency deviation in a power network, the frequency of each power generator was analyzed.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle

Sentencas: Consequently, the output of IGFC gas and steam turbines could not be controlled in the target range.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle

Sentencas: Therefore, it was necessary to stabilize the quantity of exhaust heat by improving the heat transfer speed of the SOFC.
Titulo: Study on the dynamic characteristics of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle
